org.hps.record.triggerbank

Class VTPSinglesTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.triggerbank.VTPSinglesTrigger

  • public class VTPSinglesTrigger
extends Object
    Class VTPSinglesTrigger Parse HPS Singles Trigger of VTP and store information. HPS Singles Trigger:
    • 10bit [0 : 9] trigger time in 4 ns unit
    • 9bit [10 : 18] pass bits
    • 1bit [19 : 19] TOP or BOT
    • 3bit [20 : 22] single cluster trigger bit instance: 0 to 3

      • getTopNBot

        public int getTopNBot()
        Get value of TOP_NBOT to indicate trigger occurred at TOP or bottom ECal Half.
        Returns:
        Return value of TOP_NBOT. 1 means occurred at top, 0 means occurred at bottom.
